import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Dashboard from"./Dashboard";import Login from"./Login";// N'oublie pas d'importer Login !
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[token,setToken]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem("token");if(stored)setToken(stored);},[]);const handleLogin=receivedToken=>{setToken(receivedToken);localStorage.setItem("token",receivedToken);};const handleLogout=()=>{setToken(null);localStorage.removeItem("token");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{token:token,onLogout:handleLogout}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{onLogin:handleLogin})});}export default App;
